ParameterFields.Name: Horizontal Sight Range (Hundreds)
ParameterFields.ToolTip: This number multiplied by 100 is the radius of the cylinder it can see Link within. 255 will default to a range of 1000 for Peahats or 12000 for Seahats.

ParameterFields.Name: Vertical Sight Range (Hundreds)
ParameterFields.ToolTip: This number multiplied by 100 is half the height of the cylinder it can see Link within. 255 will default to a range of 500 for Peahats or 6000 for Seahats.
